en.bdb: From his seventh head he was seeing Ram and the army of monkeys and other mighty warriors. He was shaking his eight head and surveying everything from his ninth head and he was getting highly infuriated with rage.605.

ss.gurmukhi: A`TvyW isr nUM (Zm nwl) ihlw irhw hY Aqy nOvyW nwl sUrimAW auqy ivAMg ksdw hY। dsvyW nwl kRoD Bry bcn boldw hY ]605]

en.bdb: Sometimes they fight on this side and challenging on the other and whenever they strike the blows, the enemies flee

en.bdb: They appear like one intoxicated on eating hemp and roaming hither and thither.606.

verse.gurmukhi: vly v`l sweI jIvI jugw qweI qYNfy GolI jweI AlwvIq AYsy ]
verse.unicode: ਵਲੇ ਵੱਲ ਸਾਈ ਜੀਵੀ ਜੁਗਾ ਤਾਈ ਤੈਂਡੇ ਘੋਲੀ ਜਾਈ ਅਲਾਵੀਤ ਐਸੇ ॥

en.bdb: The warriors roared and the heavenly damsels roamed in the sky in order to see the unique war. They prayed that this warrior waging the dreadful war should live for ages
